attributes.action: let the people decide - through a national referendum - whether they are prepared to have that abomination known as Tony Blair representing them as the President of the EU.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Tony Blair is a prison convict in waiting and he would NOT be the choice of the majority of the right thinking population of this country to be the man in charge of the local brewery, let alone the EU.  The people MUST be given a voice over this appointment.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
